content: grande neck warmer yarn cascade 220 grande or 200g of bulky yarn needles us 10 6mm gauge 13 sts over 4 10cm finished size 12 5 wide by 11 folded directions co 42 stitches i used the old norwegian cast on but use your favorite knit 3 row in garter stitch slipping first stitch with the yarn in the front row 1 rs sl1pwyf knit to end row 2 ws sl1pwyf k2 p to last 3 sts k3 repeat row 1-2 for 50 row total neck opening row 51 rs sl1pwyf k9 bobble 22 sts loosely k10 you will have 10 stitches on each side with 22 bond off stitches in the middle row 52 ws sl1pwyf k2 p7 co 22 sts using the backwards loop cast on p7 k3 42 stitches on the needle repeat row 1-2 for 50 more row knit 3 row in garter stitch continuing to slip first stitch with yarn in front bobble loosely pickup and knit 52 stitches around neck opening k1 p1 ribbing for 4 or desired length bobble loosely weave in ends and block
